name: QrPixelDecodeInfo
summary: Diagnostics returned by pixel-based QR decoding attempts.

properties.name: Scale
properties.summary: Gets the scale factor applied before decoding.

properties.name: Invert
properties.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the image was inverted.

properties.name: CandidateCount
properties.summary: Gets the number of candidate finder patterns detected.

properties.name: CandidateTriplesTried
properties.summary: Gets the number of finder triples evaluated.

properties.name: Dimension
properties.summary: Gets the decoded module dimension, when available.

properties.name: IsSuccess
properties.summary: Gets a value indicating whether decoding succeeded.

properties.name: Confidence
properties.summary: Gets a confidence score (0..1) for the decode.
